text: The smell of freshly cut grass is actually a plant distress signal.
Octopuses can edit their own RNA on the fly.
There's a water reservoir in space containing 140 trillion times Earth's ocean water.
Honey badgers can survive venomous snake bites that would kill other animals.
The longest anyone has stayed awake is 11 days.
Venus flytrap plants can count to five before closing.
Tardigrades survived 10 days in the vacuum of space.
A jiffy is an actual unit of time: 1/100th of a second.
The inventor of the popsicle was 11 years old.
Crows can recognize themselves in mirrors.
The shortest complete sentence in English is 'I am.'
Goats have accents that vary by region.
There's a species of shark that can live for 500 years.
Ancient Romans used urine to whiten their teeth.
The longest word in English has 189,819 letters (a protein name).
Mushrooms are more genetically similar to humans than to plants.
A single spaghetti strand is called a spaghetto.
The @ symbol is called 'arroba' in Spanish.
Dolphins call each other by unique whistles — essentially names.
The moon has a faint atmosphere called an exosphere.
Pineapples take 2 years to grow.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
There's a planet that rains glass sideways.
The inventor of the Frisbee was cremated and turned into frisbees.
Honey never expires — 3000-year-old honey is still edible.
A day on Venus is longer than its year.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't.
Scotland's national animal is the unicorn.
Cats can't taste sweetness.
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
The first computer virus was called 'Creeper.'
Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated.
A bolt of lightning is 5 times hotter than the sun's surface.
The inventor of the microwave noticed his candy bar melted.
Elephants are the only animals that can't jump.
Vending machines kill more people than sharks annually.
The moon is lemon-shaped, not round.
Cleopatra lived closer to the iPhone than to the pyramids.
Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire.
A group of owls is called a parliament.
Honey bees can recognize human faces.
The total length of your blood vessels is 60,000 miles.
Trees communicate through underground fungal networks.
An octopus has 3 hearts and blue blood.
Hot water freezes faster than cold water sometimes.
The strongest muscle in the body is the masseter (jaw).
Russia has more surface area than Pluto.
A group of crows is called a murder.
Glass balls bounce higher than rubber balls.
The shortest war lasted 38 minutes.
A flea can jump 350 times its body length.
Your stomach acid can dissolve metal.
The Great Wall of China isn't visible from space.
A hummingbird weighs less than a nickel.
Sharks have been around longer than trees.
Armadillos always give birth to identical quadruplets.
The inventor of the lobotomy won a Nobel Prize.
Horses can't vomit.
The word 'nerd' was first used by Dr. Seuss.
A single Google search uses 1,000 computers in 0.2 seconds.
Sneezes travel at 100 mph.
The longest hiccuping spree lasted 68 years.
Oysters can change gender multiple times.
A cockroach can hold its breath for 40 minutes.
The letter J was the last letter added to the English alphabet.
Platypus venom can cause pain for months.
Some frogs can freeze solid and survive.
A day on Mercury lasts 59 Earth days.
The word 'set' has over 430 definitions.
Humans share 60% of DNA with bananas.
A blue whale's heart is the size of a small car.
There's a planet made entirely of diamonds.
Koalas sleep 22 hours a day.
The longest English word without a vowel is 'rhythms.'
A group of jellyfish is called a smack.
The inventor of Vaseline ate a spoonful every day.
Newborn babies don't have kneecaps.
The average person walks 100,000 miles in their lifetime.
Dolphins sleep with one eye open.
A day on Jupiter is only 10 hours.
The inventor of the fire hydrant is unknown — records burned.
Polar bear fur is actually transparent, not white.
A group of pandas is called an embarrassment.
The smell after rain is called petrichor.
Starfish don't have brains.
A cat has 230 bones, humans have 206.
The Pacific Ocean covers more area than all landmasses combined.
Hippos produce pink sweat.
The inventor of the Pringles can is buried in one.
A snail can sleep for 3 years.
The first alarm clock could only ring at 4 AM.
Fingernails grow 4x faster than toenails.
A single lightning strike can power a town for a month.
Butterflies taste with their feet.
The human nose can detect 1 trillion scents.
Crows hold grudges and pass them to their children.
A crocodile can't stick out its tongue.
The shortest complete sentence is 'Go.'
Chameleons change color based on mood, not surroundings.
